references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
Walsh, T. R. S.; Lehman, A. B.; Counting rooted maps by genus. III: Nonseparable maps. J. Combinatorial Theory Ser. B 18 (1975), 222-259.
formula: a(n) seems to be divisible by n+1. - _Ralf Stephan_, Sep 01 2003
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
